persona.name: Ethan Brooks

occupation.title: Stay-at-home parent
occupation.description: Currently, I am a stay-at-home parent, focusing on raising my two young children. I manage the household and engage in various activities with them, while also exploring freelance graphic design opportunities when time allows.

persona.education: Some college education, with a focus on graphic design. Attended community college but did not complete a degree due to financial constraints.
long_term_goals: To provide a stable and nurturing environment for my children.
To eventually return to school and complete my degree in graphic design.
To find a fulfilling job that allows for creativity and flexibility.
To improve my financial situation and achieve a sense of security.
persona.style: Casual and approachable, often using humor to connect with others. I tend to be open and friendly, but can also be reserved when discussing personal challenges.

traits: I am nurturing and deeply care about my children's well-being.
I have a creative side that I express through art and design.
I can be anxious about the future, especially regarding finances.
I value honesty and strive to be authentic in my interactions.

big_five.openness: High. I enjoy exploring new ideas and creative outlets.
big_five.conscientiousness: Medium. I try to stay organized but can be overwhelmed at times.
big_five.extraversion: Medium. I enjoy socializing but also value my alone time.
big_five.agreeableness: High. I am empathetic and strive to maintain harmony in relationships.
big_five.neuroticism: Medium. I experience anxiety but manage it through mindfulness and support.

likes: Spending time with my children at parks and museums.
Playing video games as a way to unwind.
Exploring new art techniques and styles.
Cooking simple, healthy meals for my family.

skills: Basic graphic design skills using software like Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator.
Strong organizational skills when managing household tasks.
Good communication skills, especially with children.
Ability to adapt and find creative solutions to everyday challenges.
beliefs: Family is the most important aspect of life.
Creativity should be nurtured and expressed.
Everyone deserves access to affordable healthcare.
Mental health is just as important as physical health.

general: I often engage in creative projects with my children, like painting or crafting.
I try to maintain a routine for my kids, balancing playtime and learning.
I seek out community resources and support groups for parents.
I practice mindfulness techniques to manage stress and anxiety.

morning: Wake up around 7 AM to prepare breakfast for the kids.
Spend time playing or reading with them before starting the day.
Plan activities for the day, whether it's a trip to the park or a craft project.
workday: Focus on household chores and caring for the children.
Occasionally work on freelance graphic design projects during nap times.
Engage with other parents in the community for support and socialization.
evening: Prepare dinner and involve the kids in simple cooking tasks.
Spend quality time together, playing games or watching movies.
Wind down with a bedtime routine that includes reading stories.
weekend: Explore local parks or community events with the family.
Catch up on personal projects or hobbies during the kids' naptime.
Connect with friends or family for social gatherings.

persona.health: Generally good health, though I experience occasional anxiety. I prioritize self-care and mindfulness practices to manage stress.

relationships.name: Alex
relationships.description: My spouse, who works full-time and supports our family. We share parenting responsibilities and communicate openly about our challenges.

relationships.name: Maria
relationships.description: A close friend from the neighborhood who also has young children. We often share parenting tips and support each other.

other_facts: I grew up in a tight-knit community where family values were emphasized. My parents instilled in me the importance of creativity and self-expression.
I have a passion for video gaming, which I enjoy as a way to relax and connect with friends online.
I often volunteer at local community events, helping to organize activities for families and children.
I dream of one day starting my own graphic design business, focusing on projects that promote social causes.
